mapper.sql: id , title, create_time, update_time, del_flag, content, type_id
mapper.select: select a.*, b.name as type_name from paper as a left join paper_type as b on a.type_id = b.id where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select a.*, b.name as type_name from paper as a left join paper_type as b on a.type_id = b.id
select a.*, b.name as type_name from paper as a left join paper_type as b on a.type_id = b.id where a.type_id = #{pid}
mapper.insert: insert into paper (id, title, create_time, update_time, del_flag, content, type_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into paper
id,
title,
create_time,
update_time,
del_flag,
content,
type_id,

mapper.update:
update paper
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update paper set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
